name: Phantom Shield - For Brackey's Jam 2022.1
description:
Controls: Mouse position to aim player, Space to start/restart the game.

Banish enemies by hitting them with your shield, consume them by letting them hit you.

How To Play:

Block the real enemies. These are the same color as the hostile color, are fully opaque, and will damage you if they hit you. You gain score by banishing them.

Eat the souls of the fakes. These are less opaque and wispier, and are the other colors aside from the hostile one. Consume them to earn score, you will lose score if you banish them with your shield.

The Colors will change on a timer. Previous fake enemies can become real and you only have a split second to react!

Press Space to Start.

---

Made for Brackey's Gamejam 2022.1 with Construct 3. All art, code and audio assets created solo by Fatal Exit.

Third party FX shaders used: Drop Shadow & Better Outline. Font: KassiaRegular
